definition: turtle shell
freshwater soft-shelled turtle
variant of 鱉|鳖[bie1]

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: The method can be used for controlling the quality of the micro-porphyrizaed granula .
sentences.chinese: 该方法准确，可靠，可用于控制鳖甲山楂颗粒的质量。

sentences.english: Objective To screen the active constituent from Carapax Trionycis.
sentences.chinese: 目的筛选鳖甲抗肝纤维化的活性组分。

sentences.english: Vinegar turtle, a processed product using the stir-baking in sand with hot vinegar quenched.
sentences.chinese: 醋鳖甲，是采用砂烫醋淬的方法得到的生鳖甲炮制品。
